title: Memory usage within normal range
diagnosis: Memory consumption is stable and well below the configured threshold, indicating healthy resource utilization after deployment.
suggested_actions: Consider optimization if usage trends upward

title: High error rate after deployment
diagnosis: The service is returning an unusually high number of errors after deployment, indicating a possible application or dependency failure.
suggested_actions: Review recent configuration or code changes

title: High latency detected
diagnosis: Response time increased significantly after deployment, which may indicate slow dependencies or resource contention.
suggested_actions: Inspect slow queries or external API calls
Consider rollback if latency remains high

title: CPU usage spike detected
diagnosis: CPU consumption increased significantly after deployment and is trending upward, which may lead to performance degradation.
suggested_actions: Review recent code changes for inefficiencies
Optimize hot paths in the code

title: Memory usage approaching threshold
diagnosis: Memory consumption increased after deployment and is approaching critical limits, which may impact service stability.
suggested_actions: Ensure memory limits are correctly set

title: Traffic lower than baseline after deployment
diagnosis: Post-deployment traffic is significantly lower compared to the pre-deployment baseline, while no strong error or latency increase was detected.
suggested_actions: Compare traffic with previous time periods
Monitor error rate and latency for further signals

title: Latency improved after deployment
diagnosis: Response time decreased after deployment, indicating successful performance optimizations in the new version.
suggested_actions: Share best practices with other teams

title: Health check failure detected
diagnosis: Service failed to respond to health checks after deployment. The deployment pipeline automatically initiated a rollback.
suggested_actions: Verify port bindings and network settings

title: Initial CPU spike detected but stabilizing
diagnosis: CPU consumption spiked immediately after deployment but is trending downward, which is typical for services with initialization overhead.
suggested_actions: Monitor for 15 more minutes before taking action

title: Frontend bundle size optimized
diagnosis: The new deployment successfully reduced the frontend bundle size by 12%, improving page load times and user experience.
suggested_actions: Verify all features are working correctly
Consider applying similar optimizations to other projects
